attributes.additional_details: There are currently no politician we would care for it is time to make a massive change in Politics and electing Jeremy Clarkson would make for a popular vote
attributes.background: To elect Jeremy Clarkson as Prime minister and make a TV show about it

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes requests for particular people to be appointed Prime Minister.

We also can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. Decisions about whether to make a television programme about the appointment of the new Prime Minister are a matter for broadcasters and television production companies, not the UK Government or Parliament.
